house_listing.house_description: Golf course lot with incredible view-master suite with gas log fireplace,jetted tub,separate shower,large walk-in closet-a private sanctuary at the end of a busy day-also spacious family room with cathedral ceiling,eat-in kitchen with pantry.Rent to own possible.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, CeilingFan(s), Club House, Garage Door Opener, Pantry, Walk-In Closet(s)
